name: Barbarian
blurb: Savage warriors who fight with primal fury.
writeup: Striding out of the wilderness come indomitable men and ferocious women, barbaric warriors who pit their sinew and will against everything that civilization and sorcery can throw at them. Some win glory and wealth, while others gain nothing but the grim satisfaction of beating down powerful and terrifying foes.
backgrounds: clan champion, caravan outrider, fur trapper, mountain tribeswoman, wasteland survivalist, and gladiator.
